cmp: 身 (body/torso/person/life/status/pregnancy/(a measure word used for clothes) suit)
mng: to thank, to apologize, to wither (of flowers, leaves etc), to decline

exm.mng: expression of gratitude, to give thanks, a thank-you note, acknowledgement
to apologize for an offense, to offer one's apology for a fault
to express gratitude (esp. in public), vote of thanks
to take a curtain call, (fig.) to come to an end
metabolism (biology), the new replaces the old (idiom)
